name: BAM 3D illustration Kit
description:
A set of 36 high-quality 3D illustrations made with Blender and exported in PNG. Crafted and Published for free by Bam Design


You can use them for any commercial and 
personal use, the only condition is that 
you can't resell them as your creation 
and you have keep Bam Design name 
in your credit :)


Bam Agency is a Paris-based digital agency who produces well-crafted user-focused and valuable app and websites.
